content:
How can I generate a comprehensive list of all the countries in North America along with their population sizes and the primary languages spoken using JavaScript?
Here's the table of the countries already listed:
| Country      | Population | Primary Language |
|--------------|------------|------------------|
| Canada       | 37,590,000 | English, French   |
| Mexico       | 128,932,753| Spanish           |
| United States| 328,200,000| English           |
I want to include all the other countries in North America as well. Can you provide me with a JavaScript code to achieve this?
